post.summary: Assign phone number to your account
post.description: Assign phone number to your account for use

200.description: Successfully assigned phone number to account

number.description: Phone Number to assign to your account

country.description: Country for the phone number to assign

post.description: Assign a phone number you are supplying yourself to an agent. Requires reseller account.

200.description: Successfully assigned phone number to account

number.description: Phone Number to assign to your account

post.description: Return a phone number and unassigns the number from the agent account. If provided by an external integrated number supplier, will return to them too. Requires reseller account.

number.description: Phone Number to unassign from your account

post.summary: Search for local numbers by locality
post.description: Search for a phone number based on city, region, and country.

404.description: No phone numbers available for the search area. Please try a different area.

city.description: City you are searching for. If the particular city is unavailable, phone numbers from a 10 mile radius will be returned

region.description: Region for the search. If searching within the U.S., this will be the state

post.summary: Search for local numbers by prefix
post.description: Search for a phone number based on prefix.

404.description: No phone numbers available for the search area. Please try a different area.

strict.description: If strict search is to be used. If no results found, will other numbers in same general area.

post.summary: Search for local numbers by phrase
post.description: Search for a phone number based on phrase.

404.description: No phone numbers available for the search area. Please try a different area.

phrase.description: String to search for. This supports asterisk wildcards *

region.description: Region for the search. If searching within the U.S., this will be the state

city.description: City you are searching for. If the particular city is unavailable, phone numbers from a 10 mile radius will be returned

get.description: Fetch rooms in priority inbox

unregistered.description: If the other user is registered on Vida platform or offnet

unregisteredDisplayName.description: Display name for unregistered user which is often their phone number or email

destinationInboxType.description: Indicator which inbox on the other user side the conversation is in

lastMessage.description: Last message text in the room

lastMessageTimestamp.description: Epoch of the last messages timestamp

chatAgentCampaignId.description: Agent Id that handled the message

get.description: Fetch rooms in junk inbox

unregistered.description: If the other user is registered on Vida platform or offnet

unregisteredDisplayName.description: Display name for unregistered user which is often their phone number or email

destinationInboxType.description: Indicator which inbox on the other user side the conversation is in

lastMessage.description: Last message text in the room

lastMessageTimestamp.description: Epoch of the last messages timestamp

chatAgentCampaignId.description: Agent Id that handled the message

get.description: Fetch recent messages across all inboxes.

usdRate.description: USD rate associated with the message

timestamp.description: Epoch of the last message's timestamp

message.example: Hi there! Lyle is currently unavailable. Could you please let me know the nature of your call or message and any specific details you'd like me to pass on to him? Thanks!

aiAgent.description: Whether an AI agent is involved

gift.description: If this message included a monetary gift

campaignId.description: Campaign ID associated with the message

missedCall.description: Whether it was a missed call

cnamSpam.description: Whether the call was marked as spam by CNAM

callingUserIsContact.description: Whether the calling user is a contact

callDialog.description: Array of dialog entries with roles and contents for Calls

content.example: Hello! This is the answering assistant. How can I help you?

chatDialog.description: Array of dialog entries with roles and contents for Chats

content.example: Hello! This is the answering assistant. How can I help you?

agentReplyCount.description: The number of agent responses in the conversation. Useful for billing.

get.description: Fetch all messages for a particular room Id

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: Room Id to fetch messages for

timestamp.description: Epoch of the last messages timestamp

status.description: If message was delivered. Status of success indicates delivered

gift.description: If this message included a monetary gift

drip.description: If this message was a paid drip

source.description: Source medium for the message. Could have sourced from a vida client, sms, voice, email

roomInitiator.description: User name who first initiated contact for the room

post.description: Publish your staging agent to your active default agent.
Revert staging agent to current default active agent settings

get.description: Return the stored version snapshots for an agent. Pass ?includeData=true to embed full snapshots.

parameters.name: includeData
parameters.description: If true the response includes the entire snapshot JSON for each version.

post.description: Snapshot the current staging or default agent and store it under a custom title.
Overwrite an existing version snapshot by its numeric versionId.
Copy a stored snapshot into the staging (default) slot.

restored.description: The campaign object now occupying the target slot

put.description: Overwrite only the human-readable title of a stored snapshot.

post.summary: Queue outbound call(s) from your Agent
post.description: Backwards compatible with the previous endpoint. You can pass a single "target" and optional "context" (old behavior), or provide "targets" to enqueue multiple calls. This endpoint queues tasks instead of dialing immediately.

target.description: Phone in E.164 or VIDA username

context.description: Context for the agent to use during the call
context.example: Name: Lyle Pratt. Interested in product demo.

taskContext.description: Task-specific context injected only for this call

greeting.description: Custom greeting to use at call start

agentId.description: Optional campaign id override for the call

scheduledFor.description: Unix seconds in the future to schedule the call

externalTaskId.description: Optional customer-provided identifier applied to created task(s)

targets.description: Array of destinations or objects with per-item options

context.description: Context applied to all items when targets is an array of strings

taskContext.description: Task-specific context applied to all items when targets is an array of strings

greeting.description: Greeting applied to all items when targets is an array of strings

waitToGreet.description: Delay greeting until caller speaks for all items when targets is an array of strings

agentId.description: Agent id applied to all items when not provided per item

scheduledFor.description: Schedule applied to all items when not provided per item

scheduleSpacingSec.description: If provided, stagger scheduledFor by this many seconds per index

meta.description: Metadata applied to all items when not provided per item

externalTaskId.description: Identifier applied to all created tasks

batchStrings.summary: Multiple string targets with shared context

batchObjects.summary: Multiple object targets with per-item overrides

get.description: List all your existing webhook destinations.

post.description: Add a new webhook destination.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Phone number in E.164 format or VIDA username of the user

context.example: Customer Name: John Doe, Car Model: Toyota Camry, Last Oil Change: 2023-05-15

post.description: Injects additional information context your agent can use in conversations with a specific person.

target.description: Phone number in E.164 format or VIDA username of the user

context.example: Customer Name: John Doe, Car Model: Toyota Camry, Last Oil Change: 2023-05-15

get.description: Retrieve all tasks for the current org. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of tasks to return

post.description: Submit a new task (call, text, ping). For calls/texts, target is required.

post.summary: Create multiple tasks via CSV upload
post.description: Upload a CSV file to create multiple tasks. The CSV must include a header row. Recognized columns include type, target, context, taskContext, greeting, waitToGreet, accountId, scheduledFor, message, and externalTaskId.

400.description: Invalid CSV or missing required fields

dryRun.description: Validate only; do not enqueue jobs

post.description: Update task limit settings. Non-superAdmins cannot edit daily or concurrencyPerRun.

403.description: Forbidden for non-superAdmins editing restricted fields

post.description: Update fields on an existing task by ID.

productPlanId.description: Product Plan Id to enable subscription

term.description: Subscription length of month or year

cancelUrl.description: If using external payment processor (eg Stripe) what url to redirect if payment canceled

successUrl.description: If using external payment processor (eg Stripe) what url to redirect if payment successful

checkoutType.description: Which checkout session you would like to start. Embedded session or external redirect url

get.description: Generate a single-use authentication token for the specified account  Reseller/Partner account required. If the email does not exist and an externalAccountId is provided, the system will automatically add that email as a member of the organization.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Alternative to externalAccountId. Provide either this or your externalAccountId (optional)

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of the account user

401.description: Unauthorized : missing / bad API key or token

404.description: No account found OR caller lacks access

message.example: Account not found for key: user@example.com
An error occurred while fetching authentication token

post.description: Configure or update your ADR export settings

rotationMinutes.description: How many minutes of records should be contained in each file

host.description: hostname or IP address where to ship the ADR files to

port.description: Port for the SFTP or FTP service

username.description: username for the sftp or ftp account

password.description: password for the sftp or ftp account

path.description: Folder path to deposit the files to. Defaults to the users home directory

post.description: Update certain settings for an organization  Reseller/Partner only.

parameters.name: targetOrganizationId
parameters.description: Target Organization Id to update settings for

200.description: At least one setting was successfully updated

400.description: Bad request  nothing updated *or* specific validation failure

NothingUpdated.summary: Request parsed but no valid changes supplied

ProductPlanCheckoutRequired.summary: Product-plan change blocked until checkout completed

value.message: Unable to change product plan, customer has not yet completed billing checkout. Please offer the plan first.
Invalid email provided. Doesn't look like a valid email address.

productPlanId.description: Change Product Plan Id on the Organization. Note: if the target product plan is tied to a Stripe or Chargebee product and the customer has not yet subscribed - this will not work. Give the customer an offered product plan first. Otherwise - this will update the product plan on Vida and in the configured billing system.

offeredProductPlanId.description: Give an offer of a product plan to a customer. Useful when offering a private plan before the customer has completed checkout. Set null to remove it

email.description: Change main owner Email Of the Organization

smsEnabled.description: Enable SMS Capabilities on the agent.

smsBrandId.description: SMS Brand Id that is registered for the organization

smsCampaignId.description: Approved SMS Campaign Id for the organizations traffic

vidaPremium.description: Indicates whether the account is in an unlocked (paid) state.

externalAccountId.description: External Account Id to match with your internal system account Id. Set to null to remove it.

externalBillingId.description: External Id to match with your internal billing system. Set to null to remove it.

parameters.description: Target Organization Id to update settings for

put.description: Modify an existing numbering provider configuration, set default, or disable it  Reseller/Partner only.

parameters.name: targetOrganizationId
parameters.description: Target Organization Id to update settings for

message.example: Only one numbering provider can be set as default

get.description: Returns every webhook relay type that can be configured for your account (e.g., Twilio SMS, Chargebee, etc.).

name.description: Unique identifier for this relay type

description.example: Proxy inbound Twilio SMS webhooks to your app first before agent processes them.

401.description: Unauthorized  missing or invalid API key/token

post.summary: Create or update a webhook relay
post.description: Forward incoming webhooks of the specified type to your URL.

message.example: Webhook Relay for type 'twilioSMS' configured successfully.
headers must be an array of single-key objects
Webhook Relay is a premium feature. Please upgrade your account.
Webhook Relay type 'foo' is not supported.

url.description: Absolute HTTP/HTTPS endpoint that will receive the forwarded webhook.

timeout.description: Timeout (ms) before the forward request is aborted.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers (array of single-key objects).

successStatusCodes.description: Status codes treated as success by Vida when your endpoint responds.

delete.description: Removes the stored webhook relay settings for the specified type from the authenticated user account.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Relay type to delete (must be one previously configured)

message.example: type path parameter is required and must be a string

401.description: Unauthorized  missing or invalid API key/token

message.example: Webhook Relay is a premium feature. Please upgrade your account to use it.

404.description: Relay type was not configured for this user

message.example: Webhook Relay type 'foo' was not configured.

get.description: Fetch the current webhook relay settings for the given type (e.g., Twilio SMS, Chargebee) for your account.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Relay type to fetch (must match one of GET /webhookRelay/types)

401.description: Unauthorized  missing or invalid API key/token

message.example: Webhook Relay is a premium feature. Please upgrade your account to use it.

404.description: Relay type not configured for this user

get.description: Fetch the complete set of webhook relay settings configured on your account.

200.description: At least one relay configuration found

401.description: Unauthorized  missing or invalid API key/token

message.example: Webhook Relay is a premium feature. Please upgrade your account to use it.

404.description: The user has no webhook relay configurations

post.description: Update an agent

welcomeMessage.description: Message users see when initially visiting a agent
welcomeMessage.example: This brought to you by Wolf Cola

links.description: Array of any http links to reference for external knowledge for your agent

actions.description: Actions that your agent can take including instructions and settings

timezone.description: The IANA (Internet Assigned Numbers Authority) formatted timezone your AI agent operates in.

agentLang.description: Agent language to be used for voice and transcriptions

agentInstructions.description: Agent instructions for user interaction. This is for chatAgents only
agentInstructions.example: I want you to payout rewards for users that answer a few questions about this promotional video.

agentModel.description: Agent LLM model to use for its intelligence

agentS2SEngine.description: (Requires Specific Paid Plan) The Speech-to-Speech Voice engine to use for voice, AI, and transcriptions

agentSttEngine.description: Speech to text engine for this agent

postAnswerDtmf.description: DTMF your agent will send upon answering a call. Useful if you are forwarding calls to your agent from a platform that requires a DTMF verification before the call is connected.

waitOnAnswer.description: The amount of time in milliseconds your Agent will wait before speaking the greeting (welcomeMessage).

interruptionWordCount.description: how many words a caller needs to speak before it is treated as an interruption

interruptionMinimumSpeakingTime.description: (in seconds) How long the agent needs to be speaking before it can be interrupted

speakingTimeout.description: (in milliseconds) the default amount of time between words before we consider caller speaking to be finished. Increasing this can help prevent unintentional interruptions for slow talkers.

speechProcessingDelay.description: (in milliseconds) the default amount of delay before processed speech is sent to the LLM for a response. Increasing this can help prevent unintentional interruptions for slow talkers. Note that this delay automatically increases and decreases depending on the number of interruptions over a period of time.

speechProcessingDelayInterruptionStep.description: (in milliseconds) how much speech processing delay is added per interruption.

speechProcessingDelayMaxMultiplier.description: the maximum number of interruptions that will influence the speech processing delay.

callerResponseTimeout.description: (in seconds) how much silence (nothing said by the caller) before the agent asks _are you still there?_.

callerResponseTimeoutHangupCounter.description: the maximum number of times your agent can ask _are you there_ (callerResponseTimeout) before hanging up the call.

noContactInjection.description: Whether the contact card for the caller should be injected into the agent context

noConvoHistory.description: Whether the call summary history for the caller should be injected into the agent context

noAutoRecordingNotification.description: Whether to automatically notify callers from area codes where it is legally required that _This call is being recorded_.

preAnswerRingTime.description: In seconds. How many seconds should the caller experience ringing before the agent answers. Valid value range is 1-60

confirmTransfers.description: Require callee to press 1 before a transfer is completed

apps.description: Array of apps to enable for this given agent

appId.description: The identifier for the integrated app.

version.description: The version of the app integration.

instructions.example: Use this app to book appointments from the user.
instructions.description: Instructions for how to use the app.

content.description: Message applied to all when targets is an array of strings

taskContext.description: Task-specific context applied to all items when not provided per item

agentId.description: Agent id applied to all items

scheduleSpacingSec.description: If provided, stagger scheduledFor by this many seconds per index

externalTaskId.description: Optional customer-provided identifier applied to all created tasks

value.content: Hi, quick reminder for tomorrow at 10am.

value.content: Thanks for signing up. Reply YES to confirm.
